snippet: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola is struggling to impose his possession-based style of play on the team as the ball is rarely on the ground but is confident he will find a solution....
lead_paragraph: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola is struggling to impose his possession-based style of play on the team as the ball is rarely on the ground but is confident he will find a solution.

headline.main: Guardiola Willing to Adapt to Find Winning Formula at Man City
headline.print_headline: Guardiola Willing to Adapt to Find Winning Formula at Man City
